scripts.example:counter: ts-node counter/pre.ts && concurrently "nodemon --ext ts,ui --ignore counter/dist --exec ts-node counter/pre.ts" "parcel counter/src/counter.html"
scripts.example:todolist: ts-node todolist/pre.ts && concurrently "nodemon --ext ts,ui --ignore todolist/dist --exec ts-node todolist/pre.ts" "parcel todolist/src/todolist.html"
